column5: Hello all, My first time posting on WC...Great Info! My group and I will be fishing Western Quebec (Kipawa Region) in mid-June. We don't have downriggers and are considering buying lead-core line to get us down to the Thermocline. I think we'll need to be down 40-60 ft from what I can tell. I'm looking for suggestions on brand to buy, weight and leader length. Thanks in advance. Cheers, Kevin
